thread.title: Preity Zinta’s selfie with former co-stars Aamir Khan and Bobby Deol is too cute for words
thread.title_full: Preity Zinta’s selfie with former co-stars Aamir Khan and Bobby Deol is too cute for words

title: Preity Zinta’s selfie with former co-stars Aamir Khan and Bobby Deol is too cute for words
text: Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 2 /116 Pic: Varun Dhawan and Arjun Kapoor scorch the ramp as showstoppers Man of the moment, Varun Dhawan scorched the runway as he turned showstopper for good friend Kunal Rawal at an ongoing fashion extravaganza. The ‘Badrinath Ki Dulhania’ actor ruled the ramp as he modelled in a white and beige traditional Indian ensemble. The actor, who will be seen playing a small town boy in his upcoming film opposite Alia Bhatt, gave fans a live preview of his ‘dulha’ look. Taking to his social networking handle, the actor shared a picture of himself strutting down the ramp with designer Kunal and fellow Bollywood star Arjun Kapoor in tow. Varun shared the picture with a caption that read, “Walking for a friend @kunalrawaldstress with a friend @arjunkapoor. I usually never enjoy walking on the ramp but today was amazing.” All Comments ()
